name: one in the CHAMBERs
description:
Hi. I'm squigglez. I made this game.

This is not a full game.

I only made 5 levels and only 3 of them have text/objectives.

This game is pretty much canceled.

The graphics are bad because I made this alone and I am bad at graphics.

Controls

WSAD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Mouse1 - Shoot/Menus

You only get 1 bullet at a time and the bullet respawns if you hit the target or the lever.

If you miss, the bullet will come back in 5 seconds * the level number you are on. (ex: lvl1 = 5sec, lvl2 = 10sec)

You might experience some lag on later levels due to my poor optimization.

Thanks for playing.
